text: aur yadi tum yaatra mein raho tatha likhane ke lie kisee ko na pao, to dharohar rakh do aur yadi tumamen paraspar ek-doosare par bharosa ho, (to dharohar kee bhee aavashyakta nahin,) jisapar amaanat (udhaar) hai, vah use chuka de tatha allaah (apane paalanahaar) se dare aur saakshy na chhupao aur jo use chhupaayega, usaka dil paapee hai tatha tum jo karate ho, allaah sab jaanata hai
